itunes:title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 2 with Sadie Robertson Huff
title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 2 with Sadie Robertson Huff
description:
For our second week in Women & Men in the Word: New Testament, Raechel and Amanda are joined by author, speaker, podcaster, and lover of God’s Word—Sadie Robertson Huff. Together the three have a lively chat about the stories of Nicodemus, Peter, Jairus & his daughter, the woman at the well, and the boy with fishes & loaves, asking questions and finding connections to their own stories along the way. From cactus roots and late night talks, to miracles and moons, it’s clear that Jesus transforms lives not just in the New Testament, but here and now.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Women & Men in the Word: New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the Women & Men in the Word: New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop our biggest sale of the year now through Friday for up to 70% off of your favorite She Reads Truth resources. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/wmitwnt-week-2-with-sadie-robertson-huff/
